ygData.subject: Re: Cash flow problems
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Killing Crushbone orcs raises your faction with several guilds including the warrior s guild.  But AFAIK, there is no way to raise your faction with the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 22 Jun 1999, G2 Dan wrote:
>
> Selling in the warriours guild in Kelethin yeilds better prices than your
> own Bard guild there? I always thought the your own guild gave the best
> prices on items.

Killing Crushbone orcs raises your faction with several guilds
including the warrior's guild. But AFAIK, there is no way to
raise your faction with the bard's guild other than quests.
So it's possible to get enough faction for the warrior's
merchant to view you more highly than the bard merchant (who
has always viewed me amiably). I was surprised to find at
least one merchant in Kaladim who kindly considers me (which
is higher than warmly which is higher than amiable).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
